ruleset.name: Apex Best Practices Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex best practices (modifiers, test classes, code quality)

rule.name: StaticVariablesMustBeFinalAndScreamingSnakeCase
rule.message: Static variables must be declared as final and use SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE naming convention (uppercase letters, numbers, and underscores only)
rule.description:
All static variables must be declared as final and follow SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE naming convention (uppercase letters, numbers, and underscores only). This enforces immutability for static variables and follows the standard naming convention for constants, making them easily identifiable in code.
Version: 1.0.1
